message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I think a 55-45 split is more fair, considering the inflation will benefit me more in the next rounds.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bigger share.
Let's split it evenly.  We both have to deal with inflation, and this way we both get a fair share.
Even split doesn't account for my initial advantage, I'll meet you in the middle of our previous offers.
